verbose_text: Using a sharp metal tip as a controlled plasmon antenna to excite the localized surface plasmons and consequently enhance the electromagnetic field in the vicinity of the tip apex, tip enhanced Raman spectroscopy (TERS) has become an essential analytical tool to give an extremely high optical sensitivity XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR XREF_BIBR.
